text: István Messzi was an Hungarian weightlifter. He won a Silver medal in the 82.5 kg class at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul. == References == Category:1961 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Olympic weightlifters of Hungary Category:Weightlifters at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary Category:Dynamo sports society athletes Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Hungarian male weightlifters
title: István Messzi
